scripts.compile-css: rimraf dist/css && mkdirp dist/css && lessc --relative-urls src/client/resources/less/index.less dist/css/index.css
scripts.application-build: rimraf dist/application && mkdirp dist/application && babel --copy-files --no-babelrc --presets es2015,stage-0 --plugins lodash --ignore *.spec.js src/server --out-dir dist/application/src/server && cpx 'src/client/**' dist/application/src/client
scripts.application-package: npm run application-build && mvn clean package
scripts.application-deploy: npm run application-build && mvn clean deploy
scripts.npm-build: npm run compile-css && rimraf dist/npm && mkdirp dist/npm && cpx dist/css/index.css dist/npm && cpx 'src/client/demo/**' dist/npm/demo && cpx 'src/client/resources/**' dist/npm && cpx 'src/client/index.html' dist/npm
scripts.grails-plugin-package: npm run compile-css && rimraf dist/grails && mkdirp dist/npm && cpx dist/css/index.css dist/grails && cpx 'src/client/**' dist/grails && grails-plugin-package --release
scripts.build-release: npm run application-package && npm run grails-plugin-package && npm run npm-build
scripts.publish-release: npm run application-deploy && npm run grails-plugin-deploy && npm run npm-publish
